text: 12.18: 2 Ko 8.6; 8.16-18Gu khaŋ tɨgɨp Taitus ga sarigim, ana nden han mbar vugi. Ana nden han vuim, gu mba nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma mbe sarigim, ana ana phorga mbar vugi. Mani vugap, Taitus nde guiguigap nde bigi thari kɨmgire? Ee, ŋka ndɨkndɨk bavira zɨn vui fhuve? Ee, ŋka tuav bavira vui fhuve?
